import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Modal from '../Utils/Modal'; function ViewListBlog({blog,deletePost, showModal, setShowModal}) { return (
Title: {blog.title}

Description: {blog.description}

Edit {/* Delete Modal */} {showModal && <>
{/*content*/}
{/*header*/}

Want to delete?

{/*footer*/}
}
) } export default ViewListBlog
